[body]: The Shah Family threw an amazing engagement party for me and Rishi in Chicago, IL. We had a blast! Check out the highlights
After 2 trips to LA, multiple visits to Long Beach, and a grueling ranking process involving printed spreadsheets, we've booked our venue!  Can't wait to celebrate with all of you in Long Beach.

We decided to use asana.com to help us keep track of all the tasks we need to complete for the wedding.  It's been incredibly helpful for maintaining a single source of truth and for helping us schedule everything out.

Rishi and I wanted a logo that we could use for our wedding website and invitations so we asked our good friend Priya Sheth to design something.  She is such an amazing designer!  Here's what we sent her (left), and what she came up with (right).  Can you believe she created this beautiful design from what we gave her??  THANKS Priya!!!
We're headed to India for 2 weeks to visit family, meet each other's extended family, and to do some wedding shopping!

I never realized how many different vendors are involved with wedding planning, and how much research can go into choosing each one.  I was fortunate enough to have my friends Khushali and Tanvi share their vendor lists with me - don't know what I would have done without them!
Big shout out to Dana, Tanvi, Ana Luz, Kasey, Karishma, Priya, Nithya, Mehul and Sandeep for helping stuff all our invitations!  This is starting to feel real!

Rishi and I got to feel like models for the first and probably only time ever.  :)  We visited The Water Garden and Santa Monica Pier with our wedding photographer, Brandon Humes.  It was a really fun time!
We had a lot of fun running around Crate & Barrel with a scanner!  Not really sure what Rishi's scanning here but he sure does look happy!

Hold the presses! Big News Just Arrived as of 5:56 AM PST this morning. Rishi just got news that Mr. Milan & Co (Mona Babhi and Cute Aditi) will be holding their US World Tour Trip around the same time as Rishi and Manisha's wedding!  Currently they are in the Visa applying stages of the process. Lets all hope that it goes smoothly.
